name: Hurt Your Heart
description:
This game Developed under the theme of "As Above So Below" as a participant in the 2022 Epic Mega Jam.

WASD to move

Left mouse button to attack and select

The game started with the idea of "self-shooting."

As it is launched in the 3D environment above, it is also launched in the 2D environment below

The attack above attacks the enemy, but the attack below attacks me.

By Taeyong Choi

Wonhui Choi

Minju Park

Sangin Park

Jiwon Kwak
